import React, { Component } from "react"; class patient extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); //inherit from React.Component } render() { console.log(this.state); return(

Relevant Information - Surgery

  • Patient Name: Mary Smith
  • Age: 24
  • Sex: F
  • Height: 5' 8"
  • Weight: 120 lbs

Reason of Consultation and Final Radiological Findings

  • 04/05/2019: RLQ Pain, fever and positive peritoneal findings, R/O appendicitis
    • Radiological Findings: Strong clinical suspicion of appendicitis

Relevant Laboratory Tests

  • WBC: 19 x 10^9 WBC/L
  • ESR: 100 mm/hr
  • CRP: 60 mg/l
  • PTT: 12 seconds
  • PT: 29 seconds
  • VWF: 25 IU/dL


Relevant past Medical History

  • Blood dyscrasias: Von Willebrand Disease - Type 1


Vital Signs

  • Consult: ER 04/05/2019
  • Heart Rate: 90 bpm
  • Respiratory Rate: 18 breaths per sec
  • SPO2: 98%
  • Blood Pressure: 160/90 mmhg
  • Temp: 39.4 C
  • Appearance: Pale complexion, severe, generalized abdominal pain

Medications

  • Insulin
  • DDAVP

Allergies

  • Contrast
  • Latex
  • Penicillin

Lifestyle Habits

  • Smoking - 1 pack per day since age 18


  • Alcohol - On occasion, 1-2 consumptions


  • Drug Use - Cannabis, on occasion, roughly 1 joint per month


); } } export default patient;
